attributes.action: review the road layout between Jct 5 & J6 of the M25 clockwise (Clackets Lane).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With slow vehicles exiting the service station and merging with the M25, it causes the traffic to slow and accelerate which in turn causes accidents causing misery to commuters, holiday makers when the M25 is closed. This also costs money to business and damages the environment with exhaust emissions
